subject: my order query
description_text:
hello there i ordered off you website my order number is #SSN3884
i had got the
Newest Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra with Haptics and RGB with mounting
brackets do i need to order the Plus x pedel control box or do i get that

conversations.body_text: Hi Rhxx,  If you purchased the ProX Ultra pedals, they come with the ProX Ultra control box by default, so there’s no need to buy an additional PlusX control box. Also, the PlusX control box is not compatible with the ProX Ultra pedals.

Thank you for the clarification.

Also is haptics been sent in another delivery

Hi Rhxx,  We will ship your items separately because their packaging cannot be combined. Additionally, the processing of your order has been affected by a delay in the latest restocking at our warehouse. We are expediting your shipment, and we kindly ask for a little more patience.
